article_title: Gaza hostage's mother pleads for ceasefire deal
sentence: Hersh  Goldberg-Polin  was  at  the  Nova  music  festival  in  a  forested  area  close  to  the  Gaza  Strip  when  Hamas-led  gunmen  stormed  Israel's  border  fence,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  253  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  tallies.

article_title: Gaza hostage's mother pleads for ceasefire deal
sentence: More  than  360  of  those  killed  were  attending  the  festival  event.

article_title: Gaza hostage's mother pleads for ceasefire deal
sentence: More  than  34,500  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
